publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1084 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees as an addition to the Business Motion agreed on 29 June 2000- Thursday 6 July 2000 after Executive Debate on Modernisation in the NHS, insert followed by Debate on Motion on Government Resources and Accounts Bill - UK Legislation, and after Continuation of Executive Debate on Modernisation in the NHS, insert: followed by Standards Committee Motion on Relationships with MSPs followed by Motion on Political Parties, Elections and Referendums Bill - UK Legislation and delete, Motion on Government Resources and Accounts Bill - UK Legislation Supported by Iain Smith*
